section.title: Shape Drawables
section.para: Shape Drawables are XML files which allow to define a geometric object with colors, borders and gradients which can get assigned to Views . The advantage of using XML Shape Drawables is that they automatically adjust to the correct size.
The following listing shows an example of a Shape Drawable.
You could for example assign that drawable to the background property of your layout.

section.title: State Drawables
section.para: State drawables allow to define states. For each state a different drawable can get assigned to the View . For example the following defines different drawables for a button depending on its state.

section.title: Transition Drawables
section.para: Transition Drawables allow to define transitions which can be triggered in the coding.
